DOC.criteria: Subject Cardiac pacing indication sinus node dysfunction ( dual chamber pacemaker ) Subject sign date studyspecific inform consent form Subject 18 year age old Subject willing , able committed participate Baseline Followup study procedure full length study Subject indicate BiV pacemaker ICD Subject pace dependent Subject previous Pacemaker System Subject know coronary venous vasculature inadequate lead placement Subject unstable angina pectoris acute myocardial infarction ( MI ) within last month Subject coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) within past three month Subject sinus rhythm implant Subject heart transplant ( patient wait heart transplant allow study ) Subject know renal insufficiency would prevent receive occlusive venogram implant procedure Subject contraindicate < 1mg dexamethasone acetate Subject enrol concurrent drug and/or device study may confound result study Subject terminal illness expect survive 6 month Subject pregnant woman woman childbearing potential adequate birth control . Subject employ Medtronic department investigator close relative investigator . Legal incapacity evidence subject understand purpose risk study Subject meet exclusion criterion require local law .
